2fa-accept: すべてのトレードを承認
2fa-accept-success: すべてのトレードが承認されました！
2fa-cancel: すべてのトレードをキャンセル
2fa-cancel-success: すべてのトレードがキャンセルされました！
2fa-token-copied: トークンをクリップボードにコピーしました！
2fa-token-copy: トークンをクリップボードにコピー
bgr-background-queue: There {PLURAL:n|is {n} game|are {n} games} remaining in the background queue.
bgr-check: Do you want to add the following {PLURAL:n|key|{n} keys} to BGR?
bgr-keys-insert: キーを入力してください。
bgr-keys-insert-example:
例:
AAAAA-BBBBB-CCCC0
AAAAA-BBBBB-CCCC1

キーにゲーム名を付けることができます:
AAAAA-BBBBB-CCCC2	Turbo Pug
AAAAA-BBBBB-CCCC3	Bad Rats
bgr-no-keys-detected: ゲームキーが見つかりません。
bgr-reset: キーファイルをリセットしますか？
bgr-summary-success: The following {PLURAL:n|key was|{n} keys were} successfully added to BGR
bot-create-name: 名前を入力してください。
bot-create-name-asf: Botの名前を ASF とはできません。
bot-create-name-exist: {name} という名前のBotは既に存在します。
bot-fav-buttons: クイックアクションボタン
bot-fav-buttons-description: Choose a button you want to be displayed on bot card for easy and quick action.
bot-game-name-description: ゲーム名のみ表示 (ゲームバナーを非表示)
bot-nicknames-description: Display steam nicknames (if available) instead of bot names.
default-page-description: Decide which page you want as your default.
display-categories-description: Decide if you want config properties to be categorized.
language-translation-bad: Only {percent}% of selected language is translated!
language-translation-good: Selected locale, {locale}, is almost fully translated at {percent}%!
name-description: string type with no default value. This property is required and defines bot name - it is used for identification purpose inside ASF only. Must be unique for each bot.
notification-position-description: Decide where you want notifications to be displayed.
notify-release-description: Notify me when a new release is available (depending on config property UpdateChannel in Global Config).
setup-description: Before continuing, you need to configure IPC access
setup-not-connected: Unable to connect to ASF IPC server. Make sure ASF is running!
setup-rate-limited: Seems like you are rate limited, restart ASF or try again in a while!
terminal-no-help: There's no help text for {command} yet!
update-available: There is a new release available
update-check: 新しいバージョンをチェックしています...
update-is-newest: Local version is ahead of selected update channel
update-trying: New version available! Trying to update...
welcome-message: Welcome to ASF-ui, standalone interface for ASF.
welcome-message-bots: It looks like this might be the first time you are using ASF-ui, since you haven't set up any bots yet.
